segments.text: I'm disgusted by the mess I see in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is just pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so naughty, trying to sneak cookies when they should be helping clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall off that stool and make an even bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat, not lifting a finger to help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how irresponsible everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to step in and clean up this mess myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know it's not my place, and that frustrates me.
segments.speaker: PAR
